it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip4

Class Ip4Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.DataPacket
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip4.Ip4Packet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Ip4Packet
extends DataPacket
    Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) packet (RFC 791).
